name: Lo-Fi God Simulator (now with less animals!)
name_original: Lo-Fi God Simulator (now with less animals!)
description:
This is a little simulation game made in a week (and a half). I wanted to finish this game by new year, but it ended up four days to late.

In this game you play the role as a sort of god creating and destroying worlds. Due to the timeframe I didn't have time for an AI or something like that. You have multiple different world generation options, and control over some parameters.

Controls (General):  

- Middle Mouse / Left Alt + Left Mouse: Move around the world

- C: Show chunks

- Esc: Show/hide menu

Controls (Create Mode):

- D: Toggle draw mode (only active when not in menu)

- S: Toggle between tiles and objects

- Number keys 1-5: switch between tiles/objects

- Left Mouse: Draw

- Right Mouse: Delete

Controls (Destroy Mode):

- Left Mouse: Delete
